posts.post_content:
I have 2 T206 that I am looking to sell: 

1. Chief Bender portrait, looks to be about good with no visible creases $70

2. Sam Crawford throwing about fair condition, 4 pinholes on border, corner wear, small scrape on back resulting paper loss $30

$90 shipped for both. 

Since I do not have a scanner and my camera is worthless for clear pics, I would be willing to ship first to established members. If you like the cards, you send me a check, if not, send them back.

 I cannot take paypal, sorry.

PM if interested.
